alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:21PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM MDT... At 621 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Chadron, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Hay Springs, Pine Ridge, Intersection of Highway 87 and Craven Creek Road, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road, Mount Maria, and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
